metadata.title: CVE-2023-42802 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: GLPI is a free asset and IT management software package. Starting inversion 10.0.7 and prior to version 10.0.10, an unverified objectinstantiation allows one to upload malicious PHP files to unwanteddirectories. Depending on web server configuration and available systemlibraries, malicious PHP files can then be executed through a web serverrequest. Version 10.0.10 fixes this issue. As a workaround, remove writeaccess on `/ajax` and `/front` files to the web server.

criterions.comment: glpi package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
